body_html:
@goldsborough I've updated the tests to add a namespace into account.
Here is some documentation that mentions that having dots for packages is something very common when using Python Extensions https://docs.python.org/3/distutils/setupscript.html#extension-names-and-packages

@goldsborough I've updated the tests to add a namespace into account.
Here is some documentation that mentions that having dots for packages is something very common when using Python Extensions https://docs.python.org/3/distutils/setupscript.html#extension-names-and-packages
